card.text: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the greatest toughness among creatures your opponents control.

card.name: Baron Von K'alinn
card.text: Artillery (This creature gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.) Whenever Baron Von K'alinn blocks or is blocked by a creature with greater power, exile that creature. You lose life equal to its power.

card.name: Catlin, the Treasurer
card.text: Artillery (This creature gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.) Whenever Catlin, the Treasurer deals combat damage to a player, put that many colorless artifact tokens named Loot onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this artifact: Add {1} to your mana pool."

card.name: Root of All Evil
card.text: Artillery (This creature gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.) Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to Root of All Evil. Whenever a non-Zombie creature you control dies, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Bamdo the Professional
card.text: Artillery (This creature gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.) Whenever Bamdo the Professional or another creature you control attacks alone, look at the top four cards of your library. You may put an Equipment card with converted mana cost 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield attached to that creature. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Adriini, Blue of Birth
card.text: Trample Artillery (This creature gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.) Whenever Adriini, Blue of Birth attacks, put a 5/5 blue Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

card.name: Steeledge of the Elders
Mask of Insanities
card.text: Augment {1} ({1}: Put a charge counter on this card. Augment only as a sorcery.) Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of charge counters on Mask of Insanities. You may cast any number of instant or sorcery cards from among them with converted mana cost less than the number of charge counters on Mask of Insanities without paying their mana costs. Equip—Discard your hand.

card.name: Infested Chainmail
Exterminator's Loadout
card.text: Equipped creature gets +10/+10. Equip—Tap any number of untapped creatures you control other than target creature with total power 10 or greater.

card.name: Warden's Staff
card.text: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, put two charge counters on Warden's Staff. {1}, Remove a charge counter from Warden's Staff: Choose one — • Equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. • Tap target creature. • Counter target spell that targets only equipped creature. Equip {2}

card.name: Bloodchild of the Moon
card.text: As long as a creature card with flying is in your graveyard, Bloodchild of the Moon has flying. The same is true for first strike, deathtouch, and lifelink. As long as Bloodchild of the Moon has flying, first strike, deathtouch, and lifelink, it gets +6/+6 and has protection from instants and sorceries.

card.name: Flashbot, Steel Savior
card.text: When Flashbot, Steel Savior enters or leaves the battlefield, untap each other artifact you control. {4}{U}{R}: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Whenever you draw a card, if it's the third card you drew this turn, you may return Flashbot, Steel Savior from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Servants of Dydren
card.text: When you cast Servants of Dydren, return all other creatures named Servants of Dydren from your graveyard to the battlefield. Servants of Dydren gets +2/+2 for each other creature you control named Servants of Dydren.

card.name: Kaggard's Legacy
card.text: At the beginning of your second main phase, untap each creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase, followed by an additional main phase. {5}{R}{W}: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain lifelink and double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Yrisa, Wood Whisperer
card.text: Another target permanent you control gains hexproof until your next turn. Return target creature to its owner's hand. That creature's controller draws a card. Gain control of target creature with power X or less.

card.name: Sacred Harmony
card.text: Each player who controls more lands than you sacrifices a land. Players discard cards, sacrifice creatures, and sacrifice artifacts the same way.

card.name: Vaeco, Prince of Chaos
card.text: Switch up to one target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. That creature attacks or blocks this turn if able. Gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. If it's a creature, it gains haste until end of turn. For each nonland permanent, choose a player at random. Then each player gains control of each permanent for which he or she was chosen.

card.name: Territorial Cragwyrm
card.text: Trample Territorial Cragwyrm can't be countered. Whenever Territorial Cragwyrm would die, instead put it on the bottom of your library. Whenever Territorial Cragwyrm is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may pay {2}{G}{G}. If you do, put Territorial Cragwyrm onto the battlefield.

card.name: Blade of a Shattered Realm
card.text: Equipped creature has hexproof and can't block or be blocked. Whenever equipped creature would die, exile it instead and sacrifice Blade of a Shattered Realm. Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, if Blade of a Shattered Realm is in your graveyard, return that creature to the battlefield, then return Blade of a Shattered Realm from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Overseer's Emissary
card.text: Indestructible Equipped creature gets +6/+6 and has flying and vigilance. {0}: Until end of turn, Overseer's Emissary becomes a 6/6 colorless creature with flying and vigilance that's no longer an Equipment. Activate this ability only if Overseer's Emissary isn't attached to a creature. Equip {6}
